product.title: Jungle Cubs | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Jungle Cubs: Bee a Friend

The beloved characters from Disney’s animated film, The Jungle Book, make an appearance as youngsters in this delightful reprise. Brimming with tales of adventure, Balloo, Kaa, Bagheera, Hathi, Shere Khan, and Prince Louie put aside their differences and learn to live together in harmony. The book’s underlying message encourages children to embrace the uniqueness of others, and to welcome even unlikely friendships.

Tie-in Activity: Using the lush jungle as an example, engage your child in a discussion about habitats. Discuss the characteristics of each environment, and list the plants and animals found in each.
